data.description: Polyline object and utils for use w/GD
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module extends GD with an "open polygon" object (which are
    commonly called "polylines"), and is a lot like "GD::Polygon", which
    already "exists" in module-space by way of it's use inside of GD.pm

    Lincoln Stein has blessed the use of GD::Polyline, and in fact
    plans to include the module in his upcoming release of GD v2.0.
    However, for users of previous versions of GD, and so that I can
    release updates and bug fixes of GD::Polyline when no concomitant GD
    release is planned, I propose we establish it as an independent
    module "listed" on CPAN.
